description: Quinua de los Andes, founded by Juan Gabriel Castro Morante in 2010, is a family-run initiative based in Soracá, Boyacá. The company focuses on cultivating and transforming quinoa, an ancient Andean crop, into various products like arepas, breads, and biscuits. With a commitment to sustainability and healthy eating, Quinua de los Andes has gained visibility through partnerships and government initiatives, promoting the nutritional benefits of quinoa while supporting local agriculture and communities.
name: Quinua de los Andes
